tool.name: GMLQ Query Compositor
tool.description: Compose, Compile and Run GMQL queries step by step.
tool.command: #if $materialize.materialize_result == 'true' : #if $materialize.choose_op.op == 'run' : mkdir -p results && cd results && python $__tool_directory__/gmql_queries_compositor.py -user=$authToken -cmd='run' -query_params=$query_params -query_output=$query #if $query_create.create == 'no' : -query_source=$query_file #end if -query_log=$log -updated_ds_list=$updated_list #else : python $__tool_directory__/gmql_queries_compositor.py -user=$authToken -cmd='compile' -query_params=$query_params -query_output=$query #if $query_create.create == 'no' : -query_source=$query_file #end if -query_log=$log #end if #else: python $__tool_directory__/gmql_queries_compositor.py -user=$authToken -cmd='save' -query_params=$query_params -query_output=$query #if $query_create.create == 'no' : -query_source=$query_file #end if #end if

validator.message: Only alphanumeric characters and underscore allowed. It must begin with letter or underscore.

param.name: create
param.label: Create new query or append to a saved one:

repeat.name: operations
repeat.title: GMQL Operations
repeat.help: Add a new operation to the execution flow.

param.name: materialize_result
param.label: Materialize final result?
param.help: Compile and Run are available only for materialized queries. Otherwise it will only save this query

param.name: op
param.label: Run the query or Compile only

param.name: import
param.label: Import result automatically into Galaxy?
param.help: Otherwise it will be possible to import it later using GMQL Import tool.

collection.name: query_results_m
collection.label: ${query_name} results metadata
collection.filter: materialize['materialize_result'] is True and materialize['choose_op']['op'] == 'run' and materialize['choose_op']['import'] is True

collection.name: query_results_s
collection.label: ${query_name} results
collection.filter: materialize['materialize_result'] is True and materialize['choose_op']['op'] == 'run' and materialize['choose_op']['import'] is True
